item.title: CosmosDB
item.description: MongoDB API Index Indexing best practices in Azure Cosmos DB’s API for MongoDB are different from MongoDB. In Azure Cosmos DB’s API. Troubleshooting and Performance Troubleshooting query performance Use <code>$explain</code> command to get metrics mongosh db.getCollection("my-collection").find({}).explain() + The result of $explain in CosmosDB is not the same as MongoDB. + `pathsIndexed` shows indexes that the query used, `pathNotIndexed` shows indexes that the query could have used if available, we can check `pathNotIndexed` array and add these paths as indixes.
